cyclone.name: BILL
cyclone.current_location: about 55 mi (90 km) SE of Port O'Connor, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: Tracking northwest toward the central Texas coast, then expected to move inland across south-central Texas and Oklahoma as it weakens
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near Port O'Connor, TX (central Texas coast)

weather_observation.warning_coast: Baffin Bay to High Island, Texas
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Central and upper Texas coast; western Louisiana coast
weather_observation.rainfall: Remnant moisture may bring light to moderate rain well after landfall, but widespread 4-inch totals are not expected in Northern Indiana.
